title: Flesh Font
content:
A Dutch artist named Thijs Verbeek has created an alphabet using clothespins and skin. Talk about suffering for type....

[http://www.thijsverbeek.nl/index5.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203120125/http:/www.thijsverbeek.nl/index5.html "http://www.thijsverbeek.nl/index5.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203120125im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FleshFont_5413.jpg)

 [‹ Again and again the problem of upload PDF files!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203120125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41290 "Go to previous forum topic") [Just spotted this on BoingBoing ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203120125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41283 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ahleman

comments.content:
Two minutes ahead of ya. Creepy font though, kerning this might get pretty intimate.
